title: I was hacked and need to get my Email changed again the email assigned to my account is not my Email
body: So i havent been playing in 2weeks or so and during that time all of my friends were sent a message to some "free skin leauge" but as i havent been on in 2 weeks i havent noticed until now and im pretty sure they still have access to my account so could u please try help me?

replies.body:
Submit an account recovery ticket to support ASAP. You will have to be logged out to do this, so once you go to the support page go to the top right and logout.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

They'll ask you a whole bunch of questions to verify ownership of the account. The questions are a guide and not the only information that is useful in doing so. Any information that is unique to the account without being visible on it is helpful, so if you're struggling to remember the info for some of the specific questions, you can offer similar info instead. Your answers don't have to be exact, just accurate enough to strengthen your claim of ownership.
